TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract MoveOrCopyRuleAction implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._MoveOrCopyRuleAction

Docs.summary: Represents an action that moves or copies a message.

remarks.para: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object. Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object. However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event. Refer to this topic for information about the COM object. For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

MoveOrCopyRuleAction is derived from the object. Each rule is associated with a object which has a property and a property. Each of these properties always returns a MoveOrCopyRuleAction object. distinguishes between the two action types. If the rule has an enabled rule action that copies or moves a message to the specified folder, then the corresponding would be True.
For more information on specifying rule actions, see Specify Rule Actions
